name: Configurable dices
description:
Configurable dices

Your goal is to move the player on the check mark at the end of the board.

To know where the arrows are facing towards, look at the black dot (which has to be at the left of the face) and at the black line (which has to be at the bottom of the face).

Click on a dice to add it to the program, when the 6 dices are added, the player will move.

You can reroll all of the dices with the button on the right.

You can also reroll one dice : you have to click on the button on the left, then click on the dice you want to reroll.

After winning the maze, you will have to choose an upgrade to put on one of the faces of your dice (it changes nothing because the game will unintendedly stop working after that :]).
